original_text: After many days thou shalt be visited: in the latter years thou shalt come into the land that is brought back from the sword, and is gathered out of many people, against the mountains of Israel, which have been always waste: but it is brought forth out of the nations, and they shall dwell safely all of them.
korean_text: 여러 날 후 곧 말년에 네가 명령을 받고 그 땅 곧 오래 황폐하였던 이스라엘 산에 이르리니 그 땅 백성은 칼을 벗어나서 여러 나라에서 모여 들어오며 이방에서 나와 다 평안히 거주하는 중이라

sentences.original_text: After many days thou shalt be visited:
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 날 후에 너는 방문받을 것이다:

sentences.original_text: in latter years thou shalt come into land
that is brought back from the sword,
and is gathered out of many people,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 많은 백성 중에서 모아진 것이다.

sentences.original_text: but it is brought forth out of the nations,
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그것은 여러 나라에서부터 나오게 되며,

sentences.original_text: and they shall dwell safely all of them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들 모두는 안전하게 거하게 될 것이다.
